LanguageData.AYHerbsSimple.label: 草药医学(简单)
LanguageData.AYHerbsSimple.description: 使你掌握如何种植常见的药草.
LanguageData.AYHerbsIntermediate.label: 草药医学(Intermediate)
LanguageData.AYHerbsIntermediate.description: 使你掌握如何种植较为罕见的药草.
LanguageData.AYHerbsComplex.label: 草药医学(复杂)
LanguageData.AYHerbsComplex.description: 使你掌握如何培育难以生长的药草.
LanguageData.AYHerbsYield.label: 药草收获
LanguageData.AYHerbsYield.description: 使你掌握如何更好地收获各种药草.
LanguageData.AYTallow.label: 蜡脂
LanguageData.AYTallow.description: 使你掌握如何制作蜡脂和相关产物.
LanguageData.AYCharcoal.label: 木炭
LanguageData.AYCharcoal.description: 使你掌握如何制作木炭和相关产物.
LanguageData.AYPowders.label: 研末
LanguageData.AYPowders.description: 使你掌握如何将药草干燥并研末.
LanguageData.AYExtracts.label: 萃取
LanguageData.AYExtracts.description: 使你掌握如何从药草中萃取精油及其他有用的物质.
LanguageData.AYSalts.label: 盐
LanguageData.AYSalts.description: 使你掌握如何制作医用盐类, 在药丸出现前的主流用药方式.
LanguageData.AYTeas.label: 花草茶
LanguageData.AYTeas.description: 使你掌握如何冲泡花草茶.
LanguageData.AYElixirs.label: 丸剂
LanguageData.AYElixirs.description: 使你掌握如何制备丸剂.
LanguageData.AYOintments.label: 油膏
LanguageData.AYOintments.description: 使你掌握如何制备油膏.
LanguageData.AYTonics.label: 汤剂
LanguageData.AYTonics.description: 使你掌握如何熬煮汤药.
